description:
Updated: March 2016

This course helps you improve on your WordPress Business Website. Based on the instructors 6/7 year experience of WordPress and 200+ client websites.

Discover the top themes to easily create business websites and the companion plugins to create powerful, interactive Business Websites.

Save the hassle and frustration of hunting for a plugin to solve an issues. Avoid the circle of install, test, rejecting plugins to find the right one. Simply look up the problem area in the course. Watch the solutions and how the best plugins solve the problem, download and job done.

Dip in and out of the course to find the answers you need quickly.
title: WordPress Plugins Treasure Chest
